text: Puerto Rico Highway 251 (PR-251) is a road located in Culebra, Puerto Rico. Formerly known as PR-999, this road begins in front of Benjamín Rivera Noriega Airport, at its intersection with PR-250, and runs in a northwest direction in front of the Clark and Ensenada Extension communities, reaching Flamenco Beach and Laguna Flamenco. It provides indirect access to Tamarindo Beach, Flamenco Bay and Punta Molinos in the Fraile and San Isidro neighborhoods. ==Major intersections== ==See also== *List of highways numbered 251 ==References== ==External links== * 251 Category:Culebra, Puerto Rico
title: Puerto Rico Highway 251
